meta_description: THE SWOPE ART MUSEUM is known for its extraordinary collection of nearly 2,500 works of American art including paintings, sculptures, and works on paper from the 19th century to the present.
hours_text:
1/12

# VISIT

# The Swope Will Reopen in 2026!

# Our year-long renovation project requires that the Museum be closed to the public through Spring 2026.

1/8

The Swope Art Museum is located in the heart of downtown Terre Haute, Indiana at 25 South 7th Street, just south of the Crossroads of America at 7th Street and Wabash Avenue. Admission is free.

Hours

Museum is closed to the public for renovation until January 2026

Phone

[812-238-1676](tel:812-238-1676)

General Inquiries

[info@swope.org](mailto:info@swope.org?subject=Website inquiry)

# WE'RE ON BLOOMBERG CONNECTS!

We're excited to work with Bloomberg Connects to offer easier access to information about our collections as well as audio tours on a selection of our historic works of art.

Download the App

collections_text:
# The Sheldon Swope Art Museum collects, preserves and shares American art to engage a diverse audience.

Reopening in 2026

[MardiGras25](https://www.swope.org/mardigras)

[Bloomberg Connects graphic](https://www.swope.org/bloomberg-connects)

Reopening in 2026

1/5

# The Swope Will Reopen in 2026!

# Our year-long renovation project requires that the Museum be closed to the public through Spring 2026.  
See our collection highlights on Bloomberg Connects. We are part of the worldwide network, sharing key works from our collection.

[Learn more about Bloombergs Connects ](https://www.swope.org/bloomberg-connects)

# ADMISSION IS 

#  ALWAYS FREE

[Our Exhibitions ](https://www.swope.org/exhibitions)

# Our Permanent Collection

The Swope Art Museum is known for its extraordinary collection of nearly 2,500 works of American art including paintings, sculptures, and works on paper from the 19th century to the present. Changing exhibitions from the permanent collection include selections from American Scene...
